    Resources for Queer & Trans Folks

    Black Youth Helpline

    • Call 1.833.294.8650
    • Available 9AM-10PM ET

    Crisis Services Canada

    • Call 1.833.456.4566
    • Text 45645
    • Available 4pm-12am ET

    Hope for Wellness Help Line For Indigenous People Across Canada

    • Call 1.855.242.3310
    • Online Chat hopeforwellness.ca
    • Available 24/7

    Kids Help Phone

    • Call 1.800.668.6868
    • Text CONNECT to 686868
    • Available 24/7
    • Online Chat
    • Available 7PM to Midnight ET

    LGBT YouthLine

    • Call 1.800.268.9688
    • Available Sunday to Friday, 4PM-9:30PM ET

    Trans Lifeline

    • Call 877.330.6366
    • Available 5PM to 1am ET

    Suicide Crisis Helpline

    • Dial 988
    • Available 24/7

    No Space For Hate  •  2024  •  stop-hate-barrie.github.io
